source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Use Coloured Pencils to draw a beautiful Kingfisher
items.headline: Coloured pencil lesson on drawing a beautiful Kingfisher using actual live lesson from my art school
objectives_summary: If you imagine you are attending one of my full day classes, then at the end of the day you will have painted or drawn a beautiful picture and learned top tips for creating a saleable artwork. Many students in my classes have won art competitions in county shows, in fact three of them took 1st, 2nd, and 3rd awards in one show.
Students now have their own personal Christmas cards printed after attending a special Christmas Workshop.
Learned how to blend and layer coloured pencils to achieve a vibrancy in their art.

items.title: Darkest Secrets of Film Directing

visible_instructors.job_title: Spoken Word Strategist, Exec. Coach, International Speaker
visible_instructors.name: Tom
visible_instructors.title: Tom Marcoux

items.headline: How Successful Directors Overcome Hidden Traps -- and Work Well With Actors, Producers and Screenwriters
objectives_summary: Learn the secrets so you avoid being blindsided by big problems on the set
Discover how you can protect yourself from being fired by a producer
Handle feeling scared when an actor or crew member is wrecking your film

items.title: Screenwriting 101: How to Sell Your Screenplay in Hollywood

visible_instructors.job_title: Screenwriter, Script Doctor, Author and Speaker
visible_instructors.name: Karl
visible_instructors.title: Karl Iglesias

items.headline: Learn to Sell Your Screenplay to Hollywood Producers & Investors.
objectives_summary: How to sell a story

items.title: Writing Irresistible First Pages: Part I
items.headline: Create engaging first novel pages that hook agents, publishers, and readers.
objectives_summary: Writing engaging first pages for fiction.
How to introduce backstory and other relevant details without bogging down your manuscript.
Crafting first pages that will hook agents, publishers, and readers.

items.title: New Writer's Crash Course
items.headline: Everything You Need To Know To Get Started
objectives_summary: Everything you need to know to get started writing for publication. Tips, tricks, tools, and resources for writers of any and all levels.
Learn to Network with other writers, find out how and where to submit your writing, and more!
A step-by-step process from writing that first story to seeing your name in print.

items.title: Intro to the Zentangle® Method

visible_instructors.job_title: Jai Dee: Owner, catalyst for personal growth, CZT, RTT, RYT
visible_instructors.name: Michelle
visible_instructors.title: Michelle Aalbers

items.headline: Learn to calm the mind and create beautiful art.
objectives_summary: Learn the step-by-step meditative drawing method
The tangles used in this course are the basic tangles taught in many beginner courses by fellow CZTs. Teaching the concepts of aura-ing, drawing behind and shading.

items.title: An Ultimate Course on Origami Paper Art for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: LetsTute Make it Easy
visible_instructors.name: LetsTute
visible_instructors.job_title: Experts in Mathematics, Science, Accounting & Art and Craft

items.headline: Master the art of Paper of Folding with easy-to-learn course on Origami Designs for Beginners
objectives_summary: The basics of folding and history of Origami
Learn 30+ Folding techniques
Learn to fold animals, flowers, boats, buildings, modular origami, action models, and much more

items.title: Improve your Fiction Writing and Finish More Stories
items.headline: Learn easy techniques to make your fiction better! Write more intensely and finish more stories in less time.
objectives_summary: Be able to bring a story from initial idea to completion more smoothly
Understand character development and be able to turn a blank-slate character into a dynamic, fleshed-out character
Know the 6 techniques to raise tension and suspense in a story

items.title: Becoming the Hero in your Creative Journey

items.headline: Start Unblocking your Creative Process and Conquering your Artistic Goals
objectives_summary: How to Start and Finish Creative Projects
Formulating your Artist Statement
Overcoming Self Doubt as an Artist

items.title: SECRETS of a Freelance Artist!
items.headline: Learn how to make a living as a freelance artist or graphic designer online and in person.
objectives_summary: freelance
graphic design
artist

items.title: POV and Psychic Distance: connecting reader and character

visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: POV, Psychic Distance, and 9 other storytelling techniques.
objectives_summary: Use all the literary techniques that bring readers and characters together, and choose when to use them, and when not to.
Write powerful POV (point-of-view), or write without using POV at all!

items.title: Acrylic Painting: Make Your Paintings Pop! +FREE book + cert

visible_instructors.job_title: IT Instructor, fine artist, and U.S. veteran
visible_instructors.name: Jeff
visible_instructors.title: Jeff Diamond

items.headline: Over 3 hours of hands-on learning to paint 3 fun projects to increase your skill
objectives_summary: You will be able to paint with more confidence, and be able to create more exciting and professional looking paintings.
At the end of my course you will also have created 2 beautiful works of art that you be proud to display.

items.title: Novel Writing: Get Published!
items.headline: A Step by Step Guide to Getting into Print
objectives_summary: Create the marketing materials you'll use to contact publishers, agents and readers
Apply my "Manuscript Evaluation Checklist" to make sure your work is ready to publish
Use a Story Idea to pitch your novel

items.title: GO MAKE: From Exciting Vision to High Quality Work
items.headline: Writers, Designers, Artists, Developers: learn to create high-quality work  without perfectionism and self-doubt.
objectives_summary: Let your inner critic and your inner artist work effectively together.
Work faster and with more control with the principle of exponential progress.
Judge your work more objectively.

items.title: 10 Awesome Writing Exercises For The Modern Writer
items.headline: Practice Writing Every Single Day With These 10 Awesome Writing Exercises!
objectives_summary: 10 awesome writing exercises designed to help creativity and to smash writer's block
An awesome brainstorming exercise for marketers, entrepreneurs, and bloggers
9 introspective and epic story templates that make writing fun

items.title: Unified Structure: Using Theme to Develop Character and Plot
items.headline: Writers, screenwriters save YEARS of frustration - learn to brainstorm theme and effectively integrate it in your story
objectives_summary: You will be able to correctly identity theme using foundational screenwriting tools
You will be able to brainstorm your theme using values through a variety of general, specific, odd and literary perspectives
You will be able to build theme into your character's inner journey so that it complements your plot
